name: A stained copper ring
data: It increases the users strength slightly.
It decreases the users dexterity pathetically.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
It increases the users physical resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers a bit slower than avarage.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance a bit.
